column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While the place is pretty packed and loud (I wouldn't suggest this place for an intimate date or anything)
column2: it's a great place for a group of friends to hang out and get some great food at good prices. I can't say that the service was exceptional
column3: as the waiter constantly spilled water on our table while refilling our glasses
column4: but it certainly didn't detract from the experience.
